DOC.brief_summary: The European ASV Registry ( short name ) investigate use Adaptive Servo-Ventilation non-heart failure condition . The purpose examine effect ASV quality life , daytime symptom sleep , describe usage pattern ASV regard patient characteristic document adverse event related therapy therapy safety analysis . A pilot phase enrol least 200 patient test feasibility registry . After pilot phase complete intermediate data analysis perform , registry expand several country across Europe goal enrol 1000 patient period 5 year .
